lines.text: I'm a very gut person, I'm very connected to my gut.
Am I married? Am I married?! Come on, I thought we were communicating here.
I wouldn't mind it at all.
Fame, you know, the fame thing.
For what? What would you be famous for?
For being me. I mean, what do you mean? I don't know what you mean.
My job is to watch, to watch things go by. That's what I'm paid for, to watch and to comment.
I don't want you to be my friend, I don't want you to know anything about me. You press yourself, you respect no boundaries, you promote shallowness as a virtue, and I don't like you!
You know it's strange, you look like a human being, I mean you speak clearly enough, yet I have absolutely no idea what you're trying to say.
Right, yeah, yeah. Lucky goddamn bastard!
